Note: Git init creates a repo of the project locally. Commits are snap shots saved on your machine.
Build machines, build code, run tests, deploy to dev servers. The idea is to do it often, and then everyone's changes are consistently merged and integrated to work together.
if it hurts, do it more often - check in more often, to have fewer conflicts.
Why git: Fast, Smart, flexible, safe.
Clip: A Few Reasons to Like Git

Note: The main git benefit is that it's distributed version control: each user has an entire copy of the repo on their machine, with all the history of changes.  File .git lives in the root of the local repo and has the entire copy of the repo.
Connection of the users repo to the main repo is remote connection and calls remotes.
Git is not good for binary file like video.
Clip: A Few Reasons to Dislike Git
